response: Welcome to the OLA Scooter product training module. Our objective is to educate you on the features, specifications, and benefits of OLA Scooters, and how they stand against the competition. The module is structured into sections: introduction, understanding your OLA Scooter, its design, technology, and performance, ease of ownership, and a comparison with competitors. Let's dive into the world of OLA Scooters. Thank you.
title: L1.1.1 Introduction to Product Module.mp4
